member.name: M:Project5.AddResidents.FetchLeaseNumberForApartment
member.summary: Use the FactoryLeases that hooks up with the data fetcher to get the Lease Number of the apartment chosen.

member.name: M:Project5.AddResidents.FetchNameOfResidentsForApartment(System.String)
member.summary: Use the FactoryLeaseResident that hooks up with the data fetcher to get the names of the residents of the apartment.

member.name: M:Project5.AddResidents.CreateResidentsInApartmentHeader
member.summary: Creates the header needed for the list of residents in an apartment.

member.name: M:Project5.AddResidents.StartAddResidentButton_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)

member.name: T:Project5.DataFetcher
member.summary: Class that is used to interact with the database

member.name: M:Project5.DataFetcher.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor that creates the connection string when class is istanciated.

member.name: M:Project5.DataFetcher.AddNewLease(System.Int32,System.Decimal,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Add a new lease in the Leases Table. This is sql injection protected so can use data from a user.

member.name: M:Project5.DataFetcher.AddNewResident(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Create a new resident in the Resident table.This is sql injection protected so can use data from a user.

member.name: M:Project5.DataFetcher.ObjectFoundOleDbCommand(System.String)
member.summary: Search a database and return if found. The queryString sent in needs to be one that will return a boolean. This is not sql injection protected so should only be used internally.

member.name: M:Project5.DataFetcher.GetLeaseNumnber(System.String)
member.summary: Get the lease number from the Leases table base upon the apartment number. This is sql injection protected so can use data from a user.

member.name: M:Project5.DataFetcher.DeactivateResidentsForALease(System.String)
member.summary: Updates the Active field to false for all residents who have the passed in lease number. This is sql injection protected so can use data from a user.

member.name: M:Project5.DataFetcher.DeactivateLease(System.String)
member.summary: Updates the Active field to false for the lease based upon the lease number. This is sql injection protected so can use data from a user.

member.name: T:Project5.FactoryLeases
member.summary: Class used when interacting only with the Leases Table.

member.name: M:Project5.FactoryLeases.ApartmentNumberLeased(System.Int16)
member.summary: Take in a apartmentNumber and check if there is a valid lease for it. This is only used internally as sql injection is not accounted for.

member.name: T:Project5.FactoryLeasesResidents
member.summary: Class uses to create data needed for interaction with Leases and Residents tables.

member.name: M:Project5.FactoryLeasesResidents.AddNewLease(System.Int32,System.Decimal,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Create the data needed for adding a new lease and resident.

member.name: M:Project5.FactoryLeasesResidents.DeactivateLease(System.Int32)
member.summary: Takes in the apartment number and finds the leases number passes it through to the DataFetcher class to deactive all the residents and the lease.
